description:
The style of your favourite flannels, the warmth of a fleece. Winning at Uno in the cabin or walking your 4-legged buddy to the local dog park, the Elevate is there anytime you need a little extra cozy in your day.

  • Recycled fleece blend holds onto your warmth and dries quickly
  • Snap down front placket is easy to use, even with gloves on
  • Dual pockets keep your hands out of the cold and your phone close
  • Dropped hem adds coverage, plays well with a French tuck, and adds movement when you wear the jacket open
name: MPG Elevate Shirt Jacket - Women's
